    @allure.title("Test to validate activities of published prototype")
    @allure.description("This test case validates view activities details of published prototype")

    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.validate_details_of_prototype
    @pytest.mark.validate_published_prototype_activities_details
    def test_validate_published_prototype_activities_details(self):
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)

        add_stage(stage_name_01)
        add_task(stage_name_01, task_name_01)
    
        data = ["sunday", "saturday", "monday"]
        param = get_parameter_data("single_select")
        add_single_select_dropdown_parameter(stage_name_01, task_name_01, param, data)
    
        data = ["gold", "silver", "platinum"]
        param = get_parameter_data("multi_select")
        add_multi_select_dropdown_parameter(stage_name_01, task_name_01, param, data)
    
        validate_checklist()
        submit_checklist_for_review()
        checklist_assignment(

        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))

        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_02"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_02"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        start_checklist_review()
        review_comment_ok()
        review_submit_back()
        logout()
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)

        sign_off_users()
